name: phosphor-signaling
description: A module for type-safe inter-object communication.

0.9.0.name: phosphor-signaling
0.9.0.description: A module for type-safe inter-object communication

scripts.build: npm run build:src && npm run build:dts && npm run build:test

0.9.1.name: phosphor-signaling
0.9.1.description: A module for type-safe inter-object communication

scripts.build: npm run build:src && npm run build:dts && npm run build:test

0.9.2.name: phosphor-signaling
0.9.2.description: A module for type-safe inter-object communication

scripts.build: npm run build:src && npm run build:dts && npm run build:test
scripts.docs: rimraf docs && typedoc --module commonjs --excludeNotExported --mode file --out docs src/index.ts typings/es6-containers/es6-containers.d.ts

0.9.3.name: phosphor-signaling
0.9.3.description: A module for type-safe inter-object communication.

scripts.clean: rimraf docs && rimraf lib && rimraf test/*.js
scripts.build: npm run build:src && npm run build:dts && npm run build:test
scripts.docs: rimraf docs && typedoc --module commonjs --target ES5 --excludeNotExported --mode file --out docs src/index.ts typings/es6-containers/es6-containers.d.ts
